Text:
Thank you so much man!
Really, thank you.

Did you copy the .dll from the CRACK folder to the FS9/Modules folder?

I didn't try it so I can't say anything, though my friend did, and it do work for him.
It works--piece of junk - but it works

jimbob43
Please qualify your statement 'A piece of junk'

Please Req:

Digital Aviation Do-27 Update 1.20
Cloud9 F4 Phantom or working Crack
CaptainSim B757 Freighter 
Aerosoft Hamburg Update 

Thx !!!

Required please
Dirks Software FS Force for FSX

Well I couldn't get this out of demo mode. Both DLL's are same size-date-time. They are the same.
Shouldn't a cracked DLL be a different date and / or size?
Any rate, I am in demo, only useable at KSEA.
Didn't like what it was doing to my MS FFB2, any way.
Maybe the fact that my registered FSUIPC is sort of 'taking care' of my controller.

By the way, don't use the installer from Dirks,  then uninstall it. It will remove your forcefeedback settings, with the uninstaller telling you to go back and reactivate.

Thanks for sharing, any how.

Thanks.

Anyone have Shockwave Solo Bf-109?
Possible to reseed captain sim 757 V1.2 (FS9) with the bug fix for the flaps?

Please Seed, it is a great software for those who, s got FFB!

Or if possible write a reg key please!
